content: >trailing daisy is available for downloading also on payhip 1 with a pay what you want option trailing daisy is a sister design to pearly everlasting 2 and viljavat vainiot 3 sock patterns it was my spring 2020 gift for the knitters - a forever freebie to lighten up the days of lockdown and also the days thereafter thank you jekaterina dmitrijeva jekdmi /people/jekdmi for your help with the final tech editing of the pattern ------ **pattern features ** - knitted toe up - instructions written for magic loop but dpns can be used as well - instructions written in metric and us terminology - three sizes small 64 sts medium 72 sts and large 80 sts - pin stripe gusset in the centre of the sole - reverse french heel with slipped stitch heel flap - charts but no written instructions for the stranded colourwork pattern 1 https //payhip com/b/i8uf 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/pearly-everlasting 3 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/viljavat-vainiot
